name: IS477 Final Project: The Relationship between Alcohol Consumption and Crime in the U.S.
description: IS477 final project exploring the relationship between alcohol consumption and crime rates in the United States

distribution.description: Alcohol consumption per capita by U.S. state and year (beer, wine, spirits, all beverages). Original dataset by linze.yu, licensed CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.
U.S. state-level crime statistics including property and violent crime rates. Original dataset by Ryan Whitcomb, Joung Min Choi, and Bo Guan, licensed GPL-2.0.
